content.detailedDescription: I was walking in the marina park, just a beautiful windy day. suddenly, i look up at the sky and witness this bullet-like aircraft passing by me so fast, it looked like some sort of high-government military aircraft. it was amazing to witness.
content.summary: Walking on the sidewalk then saw a big bullet-like aircraft that past by me super fast.

content.detailedDescription: I was 9years old, on hallyday with my brother and my mother in the camping of stupice on a half-ile near pula in croatia. that summer was exetremely hot and dry. the whole day we were hearing and seeing military reactive airplains flying exetremely low. that evening we went to eat in a local restaurant, we set outside. suddenly amongst the overflights of military airplains a huge object came out from behind the pines. it was boomerang shaped, black and full of coloured lights. it was advancing very slowly in a straight line during 5 to 10 minutes. i am not able to recall the end of the seing. i can suddenly recall the event thanks to an image in the generic of hangar #1.
content.summary: Surrounded by airforce aircrafts

content.detailedDescription:
I will start by saying i only recently found out that the same thing happened to my mother at the same house which makes me want to share this story in hopes of finding out if it has happened to anyone else.
i was living in cayucos california in 2008-2009 and was 19 years old. my mom was staying at her boyfriend's house for the night and so i slept in her bed. she lived in a small 1 bedroom apartment by a restaurant and bar across from the beach. cayucos is a very small quiet town at night and everyone knows each other. i woke up suddenly in the middle of the night because a very bright warm light was shining in my face. the head of the bed was under a big tall window with a piece of my mom's stained glass art in front of it, with a gap at the top of the art that you could see out the actual window, which was maybe 5 inches wide. the light that shone down must have been coming from very high in the sky to have made it through the gap in the window and onto my face! i remember feeling so scared and like somebody was watching me in the room so i cornered myself in the dark bedroom and called my sister from my cellphone. i woke her up and i cried and asked her to drive over to help ease my fears. she decided not to and said everything is fine so i sat in bed a little longer and then got up and walked into the living room and looked out the front door. no planes, helicopters or any body was around. this coastal town is super dead at night. it was so quiet and still it really spooked me. i decided to look up and i saw what looked like 2 stars perfectly parallel to each other flying across the sky. they looked very high up but not as high as satellites. if you held your arm out and put a space between your finger and thumb they would be around 2 inches apart. i watched them fly pretty quickly until they were over the roof and i couldn't see them anymore. i ran back inside and sat there trying to figure out what could have woken me up. i don't remember anything else. i recently talked to my mom and she brought up her own experience without me even mentioning my story to her. she said one night she was woken up by a super bright light in her face from the sky. right after she told me this i told her what happened to me. she said she fell asleep right after she was woken up which seems typical for her. i wonder if anything happened to us. i've seen a couple ufos at different times in my life. i'm pretty scared but still very interested and curious and have studied about this sort of thing for years now. i would really be interested to hear if anyone else has had something like this happen specifically the waking up to warm light in your face.
content.summary: Woke up to a bright light in my face, saw lights in the sky afterwards, and found out years later same thing happen to my mother

content.detailedDescription: It happened in the summer, of 1983/84, in the town of madison nj, the town in which i lived at the time. i was 17-18 years old. i and a friend were waiting in my car for another friend to come out of his house so we could start the evening. just driving around town and stuff (we were teenagers). we were parked on the side of the road facing east in front of a small field on keep st next to the towns ymca. the street is shaped like an ell making a90 deg turn 500 to 1000 ft ahead of us. from where we were parked you could see thru the backyards through the ell shape to the road farther up at a 45 deg angle. as we were talking, i was parked on the wrong side of the road, so i could see through the yards, and i saw what appeared to be a cars headlights pulling into a driveway of a house and the lights were reflecting off the windows. but something seemed strange about it, and as we talked i noticed my friend glancing in the same direction taking double takes or looks, and i could tell he thought something was off too. finally i said, do you see that? and he said yea, what is that? then i said, isn’t that that the second floor? by that time i had realized the reflection of the lights, which were unusually bright were reflecting directly off the houses 2nd floor windows. by that time my interest had peaked and i started the car and raced up the street turned right at the ell and preceded to the house were we saw the lights. at that point the object or craft was hovering above the house. i pulled up in front and i saw a large craft, about the size of a large house, just hovering. it was completely silent. it had four or more lights evenly spaced around the bottom. i was really excited and really scared at the same time. i wasn’t sure what to do. i wanted to get out of the car but was too scared. i was very close, about 100 ft give or take a few feet, away. even though i had a clear line of sight the craft was very difficult to see. i could see the lights on the bottom and could only make out the shape by the amount of sky it blacked out. i feel like i saw more, being i was so close but its really fuzzy in my mind for some reason. this has always bothered me because it seemed to get fuzzy right after the event. i know this is something i would never forget. i had better than average eyesight at the time. anyway the craft started move up the street just above the houses and treetops. i chased it in my car and then it stopped. at that point it was farther away from me so i got out of my car to get a better view. as soon as i got out, i was just in time to see it shoot straight up at an incredible rate of speed. i followed it with my eyes till it appeared to look like a small star in the sky and then it shot off to the north in a right angle and disappeared making no sound at all during the whole time i witnessed the event. i thought it was very strange it made no sound at all, no engine sound or movement of air. i was so excited i couldn’t wait to tell people about what we saw. my friend was too, but he didn’t see as much as i did because he stayed in the car. some people were very receptive about our story, most weren’t. i soon learned not to talk about it because of looks i would get from people. i could see it in their eyes. i only discuss the incident now with close friends and my kids, or people i deem open minded to such a thing. i have an intense interest in cars, aircraft, motorcycles, boats, ships, computers or anything mechanical. i have taken flying lessons and have flown several different types of airplanes. i have a very good working knowledge of aircraft and there flight characteristics. this was not any type of aircraft i have ever seen in my life and i am 50 years old. i have studied all aircraft types, just because i am very interested in them. have been to countless air shows. this thing was not from here! it did not behave like any known air craft i have ever seen. the way it accelerated and turned would have killed anyone on board. this was a life changing event for me. thirty two years later i still think about it almost every day. occasionally i will run into my friend who was in the car that knight and will ask him about what his thoughts were about that night and he acts very weird. doesn’t say much. that’s out of character for him. just another puzzling detail about this whole experience.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Hovering infront of a house, shot straight up and then headed ne direction.

content.detailedDescription: My roommate and i were talking and she was facing the window and my back was towards it, we had all of the blinds up. we live in a 3rd floor apartment which has a view of the sunset. it was about 8:30pm. she told me "what is that?" and was looking at something in the sky. i turned around and noticed what she was talking about right away. there was a few clouds and there was this blue circle orb flying around. a certain way it turned you could see that there was red on one side which kind of faded into the blue. but mostly we just saw the blue, cobalt bright blue. it would hover and then go side to side and then it would shoot straight up, come back down through the clouds and do it again. it did this a few times and was around for about 8 minutes. then it took off really fast to the right past our window view so we ran downstairs outside to see where it went but it was gone. it made no sound. we have no idea what it was. we were wandering if it could be a drone and looked up pics online but it did not look like them. we think it was a ufo.We were very excited and surprised.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Roommate told me to look outside because there was a weird light, saw a blue orb with red to one side flying around

content.detailedDescription: I obviously saw something ..After school i was visited by the adj. general of the local nike base.. which he said i saw northern lights. being a 13 y/o kid i listened to his line.I saw the sky open over a church...& a gray rectangular object fill the ne sky & paint itself a bluish brushed steel color.. observed it as long as i could.. & then delivered my papers.
content.summary: Paperboy sky opened saw brushed steel object which was gray @ 1st

content.detailedDescription: During the first days of june 2015 i had, and reported, 3 sightings from the 2nd, 3rd and early morning 5th at 12:35am. twelve hours later a friend and i went for a drive towards the directions where we had observed the celestial crafts the nights before. since i was the passenger, i decided to take photo's of the area because of the natural beauty that is new mexico. i asked my friend to slow down so i could take a picture of these unusual spires to the north of where we were. i took the snapshot. a few days ago on the first or second of august, i went to post some pictures on my facebook page. it was then that i noticed something in the one i took of the spires. i saw that there was something in the sky which i never noticed when i was taking the photo because i concentrated more on the subject; the spires. but there it is... a dark sphere which was traveling northward as the the others i had observed in june were traveling. this then would make it the 4th sighting and tells me that they were definitely observing me. i had seen this same craft a few years earlier in california which stopped right in front of me, downloaded information and whisked away and out the portal in the western sky.
content.summary: Ufo caught on camera which makes four events not three in june 2015

content.detailedDescription: In my back yard, looked up saw this thing flying across the cloudy sky, check the security camera ...Caught it on camera
content.summary: In my back yard, looked up saw this thing flying accross the cloudy sky, check

content.detailedDescription: As i was leaving new mexico i traveled on hwy 285 south towards clines corner; a truck and travel stop on i-40, from santa fe. 4 miles to the north of clines corner a very bright light appeared in the sky. a long curved craft appeared but almost instantly began cloaking itself. it was moving east to west and it disappeared little by little until gone. the rest of my journey was uneventful.
content.summary: A flash in the morning sky

content.detailedDescription: I was walking to a room where i was sleeping on the couch. as i was getting my blanket i looked out the window and saw a bright light about a mile away over a mountain across from our house. it was very bright but not distinguishable. so i got my phone and zoomed and noticed it was flashing lights and moving so i took a picture and video of the object. i layer down and looked out my window to see the object was gone.
content.summary: I was getting ready for bed and i looked out the windows to see a bright light hovering over a mountain

content.detailedDescription: First i thought it was a plane and then i realised that the flying object looks like a pen or cigarette (without wings) was moving slow for a few seconds and then automatically picked up speed and changed direction and then it had disappeared.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: First i thought it was a plane and then i realised that the flying object looks like a pen or cigarette (without wings) was moving slow for a few seconds and then automatically picked up speed and changed direction and then it had disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
i’m writing this mostly to get it off my chest. it’s been on my mind for – well, most of my life, i suppose. i don’t know if submitting this report will help me get any answers. i don’t even know if this is the kind of report you guys usually deal with, or, if it is, if anyone will get around to reading it. doesn’t matter, i guess. at the very least this will be therapeutic. 
	it’s a long story. i’ll begin at the beginning, because context is needed. as a child i was always very interested in ufos and aliens. not unusual; what little boy wasn’t fascinated by them? but – and i don’t know if this was concurrent with my fascination or if there was some abrupt change – i was also terrified by them. i had recurring nightmares about seeing ufos or begin taken by alien beings. they are among my earliest memories, these dreams, and they so affected me that i began to dread the night. i didn’t want to go to sleep, because i knew that i would have one of these dreams and/or i would wake up in the middle of the night, frightened and feeling terribly alone.
	i grew up in a big old house in milwaukee, wi, near lake michigan. it creaked and groaned and did all the things old houses do that frighten children. eventually we moved, around my teens. i have lots of good memories from that first house, but every time i think of it i feel a reactionary sort of unease or creeping dread. i hated being alone; even if there was someone in the next room or on the floor above me, being alone made me feel uneasy, jumpy, like i was being watched. things only grew worse when i eventually got my own bedroom on the second floor. everyone else slept downstairs, so when i went to bed i would be truly alone in the dark. 
	throughout this time, i can always remember my dread and unease focusing on aliens. yes, occasionally a ghost movie or something would frighten me, but never as badly or as regularly as the ufo/alien phenomenon. it got to the point where just seeing an image of a ufo or a depiction of an alien made me uncomfortable for the rest of the day, and i knew it would be a rough night. but at the same time, i was still fascinated. i wanted to research everything i could about them, about ufos, and about the encounters people had. it was a paradoxical relationship – i was, ultimately, the author of my own discomfort.
	when we moved to a new, smaller house, some of that unease went away. all the bedrooms were on the same floor in the same hallway, so i didn’t feel quite as alone when night came. aliens and ufos still fascinated and terrified me, but the dreams stopped, or at least came far less frequently and were much less intense. 
	then, just before starting high school, i was in a barnes & noble when i came across whitley strieber’s communion. i wasn’t looking for it, didn’t even know it existed, but that famous cover image literally stopped me in my tracks. it was somehow different from all the other depictions i had seen, despite bearing all the classic hallmarks: large head, dark almond-shaped eyes, minimal features. it still has an effect on me, even though i can’t place my finger on what exactly makes it unique. i had to pick up the book, and i knew that i had to read it. i did, that very night, all in one sitting. i finished early in the morning. it scared the hell out of me, but it also felt right, somehow. maybe that’s why it was so frightening – because it felt like strieber was describing something i already knew so much about, more so than any other encounter i had read about. i don’t know if there was an ounce of fact in that book, but i was and still am struck with the feeling that he got it right.
	again, despite being terrified, i was also fascinated by communion. i read it twice and was left feeling like i needed more. i was searching for answers, but i didn’t really know how to ask the right questions. it became a sort of obsession throughout high school. 
	i began to look back on my life (short as it was), at things that had always struck me as odd, standing out in my memory, but which i had managed to ignore. i began to, i guess, notice them more. i was familiar with the common hallmarks of supposed alien encounters, but it wasn’t until reading communion that i began to notice how many of those could be found in my own life. i realized that, in one form or another, the alien/ufo phenomenon had been a running theme throughout my entire life, just beneath the surface. for the first time i actually began to consider the possibility that i had had at least one encounter.
	what follows is a list of the events that have always stood out to me. it’s in as close to a chronological order as i can manage. years and age-ranges aren’t specific, and probably aren’t that accurate; my memory isn’t great when it comes to time.

•	there are the dreams i previously mentioned. these are among my earliest memories and my earliest remembered dreams, occurring maybe until i was in middle school. they stand out for being so vivid, so recurrent, and so terrifying unlike any of my other nightmares. there are three that i remember specifically:
o	being with my father in his truck driving at night and getting picked up by a ufo, the classic saucer-shape. 
o	standing outside my old house at night, before a large bush that grew near the driveway, and talking to or hearing something in the bushes speaking – something i somehow knew was not human.
o	being in a large white room with other children and alien beings who were sort of like caretakers. i remember being very frightened of them, though the other kids seemed fine, and of trying to run away by climbing a kind of ropey structure, like you would find on a playground. one of the beings was following me, trying to calm me down, i think.
these dreams have always seemed to me to be dreams, yet they’re more vivid than most memories i have from the same age. 

•	another one of my earliest memories is of someone climbing into the bedroom i shared with my sister through the window closest to my bed. this is odd, since our bedroom was two stories off the ground (the old house was a duplex). i can’t remember what the person looked like, or anything that happened before or after; i only remember lying in bed, looking past my feet towards the window, and seeing someone coming through it. i have asked my sister if she ever remembers me telling her about this, and she confirmed that i once said someone had come into our bedroom at night.

•	yet another early memory, in the same bedroom. i’m lying in bed when bright light comes through the windows, a sort of “sunset” light, if that makes sense. something floats into the bedroom, near the ceiling; something i can’t describe. the best image i have of it is sort of pancake-shaped, maybe the size of those flying disc sleds; i also have the impression of it being somehow organic. i don’t know if this was a dream or something i saw on television and confused for an actual memory. regardless, it had a strong enough effect on me that, what i think must have been several years later, while visiting my grandparents, i felt uneasy while standing in the bedroom at their house and seeing the same sort of “sunset” light (from, i’m assuming, the actual sun) shining through the windows.

•	i have, at least once, fallen asleep and woken up in two different places. in my old house, after moving to my bedroom upstairs, i once spent the night in a bed downstairs because of how uncomfortable i was upstairs. i woke up in my own bedroom. it is entirely possible my dad moved me in the night, or that i even sleepwalked. 

•	my family has a cabin in the northern part of wisconsin, near a small town. it’s fairly isolated; there are neighbors, but a bit of forest between each cabin. initially i loved going up there, and still do enjoy it; but gradually i began to feel the same sense of unease that i experienced in my own house, specifically at night or when alone. perhaps this has to do with me being a city boy and going out into the country. i don’t know, but several things have happened at that cabin.

•	one winter, at the cabin, i was walking at night with my dad. the cabin is on a block about two miles around. while walking we saw a bright orange light or sphere moving swiftly and silently across the sky. eventually we lost track of it – i don’t remember exactly how. probably it passed behind the trees or over the horizon. either way, not long after it disappeared we saw what looked like your typical satellites, a lot of them, converging from multiple directions on where the bright sphere had been.

•	after moving to the new house, not long after reading communion, i was reading in bed at night (the book was jurassic park if that matters). i distinctly remember lying on my back and glancing at the clock sitting on the desk at the foot of my bed and seeing that it was eleven, and also seeing that the hall light was on (i slept, and still do sleep, with the bedroom door open; having it closed makes me uncomfortable). the very next thing i remember is finding myself in bed, on my side or stomach, book on the floor, feeling not the least bit tired or like i had just woken up. glancing at the clock, i saw that it was now three in the morning, and the hall light was off. it is possible i merely fell asleep while reading – but if so, then it was an instant and very deep sleep, unlike any other time i have fallen asleep while reading. i wasn’t tired while reading, and it has always taken me a long time to get to sleep – it almost never happens before midnight, even if i go to bed early. regardless, the event struck me as strange.

•	during the summer, one year after i first read communion, my dad, sister, and i went up to our cabin. i went up there with a secret plan: i would go out at night and…see what would happen, i guess. i had read about people who could supposedly make contact through meditation and mental will. it seemed worth a shot. i wanted answers and was willing to try. each night during that trip i tried to go outside by myself late at night and walk up the road to a clearing where i had a good view of the sky. it was almost impossible for me to do – i was terrified and never made it beyond the driveway, until the final night we were there. i took a flashlight, told my dad and sister i was going to go look at the stars, and actually managed to reach the clearing. i spent maybe a half-hour or forty-five minutes, focusing very hard on wanting to make contact, or to see something, anything that would give me answers. nothing happened, and i hurried home. my dad and sister were still up, but i decided i was going to go to bed. i felt fine, very calm, which was a bit unusual, considering how nerve-wracking the experience had been, and how long it had taken me to work up the courage. i fell asleep almost immediately, which, as i mentioned above, is also unusual. i remember having a brief dream, in which i woke up the next morning and went to the mirror to see symbols etched into my skin. they were not there when i woke up, obviously. it was sunday and we were going to church. while waiting for my sister to finish in the bathroom so i could use it, i suddenly got a strong nosebleed. there was nothing i can think of that would have caused it; it was summer, and right near the lake, so not very dry. i think, but i’m not positive, that it was preceded by a sharp pain in my sinus. either way, i was understandably unnerved. eventually the blood stopped and we went to church. on the way home my dad asked, what i believe to be out of the blue, if i had gone outside last night to look for ufos. i said yes, and asked why? he told me that late last night he had been aware of a “presence” in his bedroom, but saw nothing. my sister then told us about a dream she had had that same night: she was in a sort of hospital room with lots of beds, occupied by girls her age, some of whom she said she recognized from school. there were doctors there placing a box-like device over their stomach area to see if they were capable of becoming pregnant. it’s possible they both knew i had gone to look for ufos the previous night and had conspired to mess with me the next morning; i don’t know. my sister seemed upset, though, and just as frightened as me.

•	this might have actually occurred that same night. i’m not certain it didn’t, but either way: while at the cabin my dad once asked me if i had been reading in bed late at night. i told him no, and asked why. he had seen a bluish-white light outside his bedroom window, coming from the direction of the bedroom i shared with my sister. i had a reading light that is quite bright, which is why he asked. 

•	on another occasion at the cabin, after the event with the nosebleed, i have a brief but strong memory: of waking up in the middle of the night, unable to see or move, gripped by the most powerful terror i have ever experienced, and knowing that i had to make myself move, now. i don’t know why. i remember nothing before or after. it could have been a dream, or sleep paralysis. either way, it wasn’t pleasant. 

after the event with the nosebleed i became, understandably, obsessed with finding out what, if anything, was going on. i began to sleep worse than ever and couldn’t concentrate in school. eventually my dad noticed and told me that i need to step back, let it go. full disclosure: there is a history of bipolar disorder in my family. my dad was worried about my obsession and how it might be affecting my mental health. 
	i agreed to let it go. i decided that i knew only one thing for sure: i have no idea what the hell is going on, if anything. i had no way of finding out, and no way of changing things either way. so i stopped my research, stopped my endless wondering, and just tried to focus on other things. it worked, for the most part. i still am and always will be interested in the alien/ufo phenomenon. it still frightens me, still occasionally keeps me awake at night. the events i have listed still stand out in my memory, and i still occasionally go on a ufo kick. but, after graduating from high school and all throughout college, i experienced no new strange events, as far as i am aware. 
	well, that’s not entirely true. in the winter of 2014, while walking at night with my girlfriend, i saw what looked like two very bright stars in the sky above our neighborhood. almost as soon as i saw them they began to steadily fade until they had disappeared completely. there was no movement, no sound, no anything. the night was clear, so it wasn’t a cloud passing in front of them. i’ve actually already submitted a report about this on mufon. 
	one more thing: my dad has had similar unusual experiences during his life. he has told me about at least one potential ufo he saw, and about a childhood dream in which little doctors took him out of his bed at night. he has also noticed that electronics behave strangely around him. several times the tv has turned on or off randomly when he is in the room, as have other electronics. there was an incident at the cabin, which he actually caught on film, during which a plant was weirdly attracted to him, as if by static charge. when he moved close to it, the plant bent towards him; when he moved away, it stood back up normally. it only happened with him. we’ve never seen anything like it before or since. 
	i hope this wasn’t too long. i don’t know if i’ve been contacted, abducted, or had any encounter of any sort. there’s enough potential evidence to make me think, and i don’t think i’ll ever stop wondering. i guess, by submitting this, i’m still looking for answers. if you think it worth investigating, i would love to communicate. a part of me is scared to dig into this any further than i already have, scared of finding out that i’m crazy, or of uncovering memories that would be better off left alone. but the part of me that wants answers trumps the frightened part.
content.summary: A report of events throughout my life; quite long.

content.detailedDescription: End of june or 1st week in july 1963,while standing roving patrol/firewatch.Saw a ufo, very similar like in movie forbidden planet.It was totally silent at altitude of about 4-500ft,could see various portholes with outlines of human like heads staring out.There were 4-5 other sailors that witnessed this event, i do not remember but believe that i logged it in my watch log. the object just kept in straight line until disappeared over horizon.Just watched it in wonder with others
content.summary: Firewatch in bootcamp saw ufo called others,about five witnesses

content.detailedDescription:
Estava a observar as estrelas por volta das 4:20am e surgiram no meio das estrelas o que pareciam ser também estrelas mas, subitamente começaram a deslocar-se em sentidos opostos a velocidades diferentes chegando a fazer mudanças "bruscas" na rota. durante o avistamento foi visivel do lado esquerdo dos objectos um "meteorito" que parecia ter entrado na atmosfera.

ao verificar os programas de localizaçao da iss e satellites confirmei que seria impossivel dado a sua localizaçao á hora do avistamento.
content.summary: Avistamento de dois objectos velozes

content.detailedDescription:
Coming from el paso tx, through  artesia nm, 
me and  my ex - husband were followed by ufos, 
then weeks later by mibs. we lost an hour time, actually  this was our 2nd encounter,  
mibs, followed  us for a good  while, pale greyish, white powder on their face, dark glasses , dark black car, very erie looking 
very scary, mibs, big headed, bald, big black 
trench coats on a hot summer day, just plain 
crazy aliens, and scary, then i had scars, on my back, had nite mares for years as if they always came back to abduct us frequently,  
my nite mares are gone, but now my daughter's 
have nitemares, i had night mares of traveling 
to other giant planets, and  oh! the things i  saw in my dreams were so real.I will never forget my unique encounter.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Followed by  ufos

content.detailedDescription: My daughter and i were standing at my truck that was parked at the curb in front of our residents . we were talking when a very strange light in the sky caught my eye .I sed to my daughter what the is that. then i took a good look and grabbed my phone and started taking pictures . i then told her to get her mother and she was mesmerize by the glowing object at that point my 6yr old sone came out the grudge door i then asked him to go get his mother. he then went back in side to get her . the object was coming towards us in a slow decent from the south at that point. then it made a turn in a easterly direction . as it moved east it started to ascend slowly at first but as it moved east its speed and its adscention increased greatly until its rate of climb was almost strait up then if vanished.
content.summary: Object appeared lowe in sky it gave off a very intense glow

content.detailedDescription:
At campsite #9, juniper lake campground at lassen volcanic national park. got up just before 5 am to use the toilet. with moon light did not need flashlight. came back after using the restroom to a place right next to lake and enjoyed the beauty of the nearly full moon over the lake. looking at the stars, i noticed a star "moving". originally, i thought it was an airplane, but then i heard zero noise. it floated above me silently. then i noticed that it had five bright lights in a circle under a triangular craft. i ran to my truck where i had my iphone charging and tried to get a video, but it disappeared. 

as stated below i do not give mufon rights to anything said here. just trying to help you out with a witness report. please leave me alone and do not quote me or post this information online. as you know, people think that ufo witnesses are crazy, and i work in a field where crazy is not acceptable.
content.summary: Silent triangular craft with five lights in a circle under craft flying at low altitude at slow constant speed

content.detailedDescription: I was leaving a movie from lincolnton north carolina cinemas. i was following behind my sister in a hybrid vehicle and she was in a pickup truck. we were heading down sommerow road in maiden,  nc traveling northwest toward her home on seminole trail road in maiden.  my sister continued on home and to the right of the car which was north as i was the passenger i could see over the tree line a large object that was disc shape and almost look like a zeppelin or some type of blimp at first i thought it was a blimp and just dismissed it but then as i look closer i could tell it was spinning at a rapid rate it wasn't much farther above the treeline and must have been less than a quarter of a mile away from me the object was approximately the size of what appeared to be a tractor trailer from end to end floating in the sky and it hovered without making any noise as we had stopped on the side of the highway to look at the object our car had made no noise there were no other cars on the highway there were no other of street lamps or any other light sources visible to misconstrue what we were seeing as the driver of the vehicle i was in also witnessed the event the object was amber and orange in color and seem to change color variations as it hovered it seems when it was spinning that they were multi colored lights and i could make out blue are yellow in a red it was slow and then it started to appear to disintegrate as it's fun quickly and then disappeared in a zigzag motion leaving some type of smoke trail that was also zigzag behind it i tried to capture all of this on film and didn't think i was able to catch anything because it was so dark and i was using the camera on my phone. as i was witnessing this object hover in the sky then disappear i was completely surprised yet arrested by what i was seeing because i was not sure what exactly it was i have heard reports of people seeing things in the sky and i've never really believed in any of it until i saw what i couldn't describe and i was extremely shocked by the size of this object and its close proximity to the tree line and the fact that none of the trees were moving as if being blown by wind and then it was completely inaudible. just shocking.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Disc shape object with amber / multicolored lights hovering above tree line.

content.detailedDescription: Perfect record.Top secret on a need to know.Allways carried a secret clearance.As required to be in ac and w 27350ab and c.Iam near end of life.And must take my info.To the grave
content.summary: 8 years active duty usaf combat ready in all air defence radar

content.detailedDescription: We saw a large yellowish/orange fire like a bonfire moving through the air slowly from a ne direction headed se. it was silent and pulsating like a burning fire. it did not ascend or descend at all and went out of our sight (behind buildings and trees) after it had traveled approximately 1.5 miles. it was silent and had no other lights. we couldn't see the outline of the craft itself at all.
content.summary: Bonfire moving through the air quietly... but fire doesn't fly?

content.detailedDescription: I was working at subway and they were building these buildings,nothing like i have ever seen. the walls had to have been 20 feet thick. i snuck into one and saw that it was not a normal room. it was a clean room with tools i have never seen. i also noticed that there was like a triangle landing area in the middle. i looked up and could see where the roof opened up in sections like 8 different parts. i started asking questions and was fired with in two days.
content.summary: I got fired. i believe it was a building to build ufo

content.detailedDescription: we were in our backyard. i saw orange lights floating in sky from left to right in 3 distinct sets.The first set were individuals. after the path of sky was cleared another would follow in the exact path until out of sight due to tree. it was cloudy and my boyfriend said he thought they were planes landing at the local airport and had their landing lights on. they did not blink and were the same color as the first ones we saw in 2013. the difference was that it was very cloudy so they were not brilliant or the shape obvious except for one which was clearly an orb and so bright it actually made me squint before it too appeared to go behind the cloud. after that group, a pattern of four floated across the same path slowly and i ran to get the camera and i got video of those. about as soon as i shut the camera off more came. these were closer together and there were several. they followed the same path from left to right as the others. i highly regret not turning the camera back on. my bf was insisting they were planes regardless of the obvious which might have been the reason why.Lol the next day he agreed they were the orbs. you can even see the fiery color in the video somewhat. we saw some on august 22, 2013 in the same part of sky. he saw them maneuvering in a play-like way and moving at extremely high rates of speed, disappearing and reappearing..Etc. by the time he called me out (so i didn't think he was nuts..Lol) there was just one hovering in the same spot for about 5 minutes. i could see pulses of light emitting it's right side. it got lighter color and elongated until it eventually just disappeared.
content.summary: First set indiviuals set far apart, second set was pattern (video of those) third set were spaced colser one after another

content.detailedDescription: I was waiting outside mabe 250 meters from town or nearist street light . i was waiting for a friend and all of a sudden i got hit with a light that was so bright and powerful i ducked and thought it was going to hit me then it lost intensity and i seen this vehicle none that i have seen before it hoverd like it had some kind of propulsion to since close objects or something like that was thinking its just military or something of that nature i was not afraid it felt like i had been around this a lot  when i felt a warning sensation and then experienced a sensation like i had a gas mask on that was putting me to sleep like i was at a dentist then woke up bout 26 meters from the road and bout 15 feet from where i was standing with no marks no anything like the reoccurring dreams that i have almost every night about this place that i have been to before but cant recall exactly what was going on but been having them ever since and are getting more vivid and seem like i've been there before for long period of time and yes i know how it sounds but im retired military and not stupid take it as you will but i know it happened and i was not drunk and never have and never will use drugs.
content.summary: Was waiting for a friend to pick me up then bam its above i duck like i think its going to hit me

content.detailedDescription: Was almost home at the red light that leads to my apt complex, while sittin at the light (red) a green flashing swirling mutiple lights started swirling inside the car like reflecting off the windows in such a frightening way that me and my girlfriend started screaming grabing each others hand. as it continued for probably 10seconds. we sat at the light was still red. then when it turned green we just sat there bc we knew something crazy happened but we had no clue what or why or how we both saw this phenomenon. i felt weird about it and still do. also the sightimg occured 800m or less from the ohio river. ive done research and have saw that northen ohians near the great lakes have had similar encounters. please let me know if u have any similar encounters documented.
content.summary: Bright swirling green lights in my car like a cop was behind me, but the brightest green light ive ever seen.

content.detailedDescription:
Chased 3 larger ufo's that looked like fountains in the sky. at first they were stationary, then began to move. bright yellow/gold. then saw about 30 or more and then they disappeared.

noticed a bright light in the sky while driving home. came to a clearing and saw a total of three that were yellow/gold in color and a round long shape. they were all blinking in different  intervals. suddenly they began to move. as we followed too another clearing to see the sky clear there were suddenly about 30 or more smaller circles blinking white all around the same area in the sky.  you could see actual planes and hear helicopter. these were nothing like that. as quick as they appeared they were gone. we lost sight while driving to follow them. 

we tried to debunk what they could be, bit as quick as they moved and as many in the area as there were, we were stunned. a total of three of us were in the car and had pulled over to watch this as well. 

we were speechless and realized how hard this was to describe. it was nothing like we have ever seen before. 

at first we thought thought it's was just a random light, but the color, size and movement made it clear that it was not.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Chased 3 larger ufo's that looked like fountains in the sky. at first they were stationary, then began to move. bright yellow/gold. then saw about 30 or more and then they disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: First time my girlfriend i saw it was hovering over mechanicsburg right in town in the daytime. probably july 3rd. it was just a flame ball. and you could actually see the flame waving on top of it. it was orange and all you could see was the orange ball with flame coming out the top. look like hot air balloon flame without basket and balloon. we watched it for five minutes as it just floated through town. two weeks later a hundred miles away on vacation we saw it again. it was night same ball of fire. it was coming toward as we drove. it was near cherry springs state park known for dark skies. anyways we stopped to look at it and this was really near to us maybe 100 feet up it stopped when we did. we watched it for 5 minutes then it slowly rose up into the clouds. we saw it again last night at home on august 5th at 9:30. this time there was more than one maybe four. it was hard to tell because the would disappear for a couple of seconds then reappear but definately 3. my girl went inside to get a camera.And they just disappeared as i was watching them.
content.summary: Saw 3 times in 3 different places. once in potter county. one in broad daylight. like a hot air balloon flame with not balloon or basket.

content.detailedDescription: Late in 1979 i was doing a delivery job at the time , it was about 6 30am just leaving the town of narborough in norfolk england when out of the left side or passenger window i saw a huge fireball appear in the sky the sun was just coming up and this object seemed to be falling at about the same speed as the sun was rising.There were huge flames all around this massive ball it was the same size as the rising sun, i was sure there was going to be a huge explosion as it dissapeared out of sight below the horizon but that never happened,i watched it for about fifteen minutes the odd thing this is a very busy road but that morning there was no one else on the road,it was as if time had slowed down and i was the only person seeing this. i am not sure what happened next but i started to drive, the next thing i knew i was at a road junction about twenty miles down the road it was as if i just woke from a deep sleep. the other odd thing there was still no other traffic and i was not on my regular route. i have never told this to anyone only my wife and my dad for the fear of being made a fool.I never heard of anyone else seeing the same thing, the only incident i have heard of in that time frame was rendlesham forest of which i used to pass raf woodbridge and bentwaters every day.By no meens am i saying i was abducted i just dont know what went on that morning.
content.summary: I saw a huge fireball falling very slowly, the sun was coming up this object was as big.

content.detailedDescription:
A friend and i were returning to our vehicles after a long road bike training ride on a two lane highway.
it was in the evening, still daylight, cool weather with a cloudless blue sky.
tall trees lined both sides of the highway, leaving a very narrow strip of blue sky down the entire portion of straight road we were on.
i looked up for whatever reason and saw 5 objects traveling from south west to north east. they were only viewable for 2 to 3 seconds.
the objects were in a cluster traveling at the same speed.
though it was a very short observation, the objects seemed to be ever so slightly spreading apart from each other.
each object had a round super bright neon blue center with a super bright neon green aura surrounding the blue center and trailing off into a teardrop tail.
i would estimate the tail to have been twice the length of the objects total diameter. the tail and body of the objects seemed solidly one piece and the glow was constant.
about one week later on a tv show called 'sightings' i watched a report of a nearly identical sighting some where in the western usa.
it has been 10 years ago but i can vividly see the objects in my mind's eye as clearly now as then.
content.summary: Bicycling back to truck, looked up saw 5 ufo's

content.detailedDescription: I was going down on the 60 freeway and all of a sudden i see a beam of light in a ball shape form and it started to change colors while expanding going very fast downward! hidding behind some hills couldnt see after even after i looked for it i couldnt see it or find it
content.summary: Fell like a small ball of light them expanded downward while changing colors

content.detailedDescription: In 1972 i  was standing in the front of my parents house in the front yard. across the field app. 1/2 miles were 2 ships they were hovering about 30ft off the ground.There was another ship on the east in of the lake 'hovering and appeard to be sitting on the surface of the lake.  after about 30 seconds it moved back to the other ships and they formed a triangle then shot into the air at a tremendous speed. they were gone out of site in about 10 seconds. the ships were box shaped and glowed in a very bright color but was not putting out visible light  the second time i saw one was around 1984. on that occasion i was arrowhead hunting on the south side of the lake(iforgot to tell you the name of the lake,it was sheafer lake on the south side of parkin,cross co. hwy 75 south)thiswas a solatairy ship, it was round,a goldish color, it had a bottom that looked like the underside of a mushroom .It came over the trees coming toward  me when about   half out it reversd and went backwards back over the trees and that was all i saw of him .My third sighting was in the summer of 1987.Same lake same time of year,the middle of summer. i was standing in the front of the house ,when when i saw three ships ,just like the  first time. they were doing everything just like the first ones.The only diferance were the ships the were almost round with more of an oval shaped they were gun metal gray. they had a had a belt of lights circling them. they had orange and gray .They looked like a lava lamp but it was circling in a horizontal direction. when the other ship came back to them,the  lava stuff started changing .There was a flat face that appeared on the part of the ships pointing toward me then they did the same thing the first group.  approxment times
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: Three sightings from 1972 to 1987
